conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I want to watch a horror movie.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
[1] Check out the classic horror movie "The Shining" (1980).
[2] Get scared by the psychological horror of "The Haunting of Hill House" (1998).
[3] If you're looking for something more intense, try "The Conjuring" franchise (2013-2019).
[4] For a lighter horror movie, check out "Scream" (1996).
[5] If you're interested in a more independent horror movie, check out "The Witch" (2015).

conversation.text: Yeah, I was really craving something spooky, but I guess romance is more my speed tonight. Do you have any good rom-coms that are kind of cheesy and fun?
